department: Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) or Ministre des travaux publics et des services gouvernementaux (SPAC)
short_summary: Fencing maintenance standing offer (request for standing offer)
description: Department of National Defence ( DND), has a requirement for supply of all labour, material, tools, equipment, transportation, and supervision necessary for inspection services, repairs, maintenance, upgrades, and new installation of chain link and wooden fences, on an as required basis at multiple CFB Suffield sites including BATUS, various infrastructures at the village of Ralston, Alberta, utility and natural gas field locations, and other DND occupied facilities in Southern Alberta.
